
---
title: "Relatório Final Laboratório 01"
output:
  html_document:
    df_print: paged
---

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(knitr)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r read}
projetos = read_csv(here::here("data/projetos.csv"))
```

```{r clean}
projetos = projetos %>% 
    filter(lang != "javascript")
```

```{r}
projetos %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = build_success_prop, 
               y = commits_per_month)) + 
      facet_grid(lang ~ .) +
    geom_point(alpha = .3) + 
  scale_y_log10()
```



```{r}
projetos %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = build_success_prop, 
               y = tests_per_kloc)) + 
      facet_grid(lang ~ .) +
    geom_point(alpha = .3) +
    scale_y_log10()

```
